history.narrative: Law 6-87, the “District of Columbia Uniform Transfers to Minors Act,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 6-58, which was referred to the Committee on the Judiciary. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on November 19, 1985, and December 3, 1985, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on December 30, 1985, it was assigned Act No. 6-115 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
